{"name": "My Father's Business", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Choice Pantry
No appointment needed
Bring Photo ID and LInk2Feed* Card (if enrolled)
*can complete enrollment on first visit if needed
SAT: Check In: 9:00-11:00AM (January-October: 2nd & 4th Saturday of the Month) / (November-December: 2nd & 3rd Saturday of the Month)", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "21001 Moross Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Cornerstone Village", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48236", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.4243318, "longitude": -82.92603369999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 936-1537", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Client choice pantry"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "No child/children allowed inside"}]}
